title: mandhara dhara dEva
sahitya:
mandhara dhara dEva mareya hokkara kAva


anupallavi

  mandAkini pita mada satiyara dhrta sundara shashi vadanA rangayya


caraNam 1    kaNNa nODadi celuvA kamaTa rUpadaliruvA heNNinA moreya 
kELda hiraNyakanudarava sILda maNNU bEDi beLedyO rangayya 
honna kODali hiDidu hattu shirava kaDidu ciNNa gOvaLanAgi 
capaleyara vrata keDisi cenna rAvutanADyO rangayya
    caraNam 2    lOcana biDutali bandu giri tALide bennali nindu bhUcOrana kondu bAla 
kareyalu bandu yAcaka nInAdyO rangayya sutajanA sutakolidu sharadhi 
kaTTisi meredu kIcaka hatagEya khEcapuravAsa nIca janara taridyO rangayya
    caraNam 3    vanadhi carisi bandu ghana dhareyetti varahAgaLa kambadindudayisi baliya 
muridu tA jananiya shira taridyO rangayya hanuma vandita pAda haruSa pANDava 
varada vaniteyara vratavaLidu mahA kalkiyAdyO ghana purandara viTTala rangayya
